channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA

item.title: Report E-2024030036
item.description:
Report E-2024030036

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T15:11:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: SHREVEPORT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ADVANTAGE TANK LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC was attempting to deliver diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank. During the course of the delivery, an issue with a valve on the storage tank caused approximately 30 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. E3 Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
